docsBpi2MIB.name: docsBpi2MIB

revisions.description: Modified CM and CMTS IP Multicast table indexing in preparation for IPV6. Obsoleted grace time objects from the CMTS portion of the MIB.
Replaced DisplayString type with SnmpAdminString type. Several object descriptions were also changed.

Tel: +1 978 244 8545 Fax: +1 978 244 8917 E-mail: rwoundy@cisco.com IETF IPCDN Working Group General Discussion: ipcdn@ietf.org Subscribe: http://www.ietf.org/mailman/listinfo/ipcdn Archive: ftp://ftp.ietf.org/ietf-mail-archive/ipcdn Co-chairs: Richard Woundy, rwoundy@cisco.com Andrew Valentine, a.valentine@eu.hns.com
docsBpi2MIB.description: This is the MIB Module for the DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface (BPI+) at cable modems (CMs) and cable modem termination systems (CMTSs).

X509Certificate.name: X509Certificate
X509Certificate.description: An X509 digital certificate encoded as an ASN.1 DER object.

docsBpi2CmBaseTable.name: docsBpi2CmBaseTable
docsBpi2CmBaseTable.description: This table describes the basic and authorization related Baseline Privacy Plus attributes of each CM MAC interface.

docsBpi2CmBaseEntry.name: docsBpi2CmBaseEntry
docsBpi2CmBaseEntry.description: Each entry contains objects describing attributes of one CM MAC interface. An entry in this table exists for each ifEntry with an ifType of docsCableMaclayer(127).

docsBpi2CmPrivacyEnable.name: docsBpi2CmPrivacyEnable
docsBpi2CmPrivacyEnable.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Appendix A.1.1.
docsBpi2CmPrivacyEnable.description: This object identifies whether this CM is provisioned to run Baseline Privacy Plus.

docsBpi2CmPublicKey.name: docsBpi2CmPublicKey
docsBpi2CmPublicKey.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.2.4.
docsBpi2CmPublicKey.description: The value of this object is a DER-encoded RSAPublicKey ASN.1 type string, as defined in the RSA Encryption Standard (PKCS #1) [10], corresponding to the public key of the CM. The 74, 106, 140, 204, and 270 byte key encoding lengths correspond to 512 bit, 768 bit, 1024 bit, 1536 bit, and 2048 public moduli respectively.

docsBpi2CmAuthState.name: docsBpi2CmAuthState
docsBpi2CmAuthState.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.1.2.1.
docsBpi2CmAuthState.description: The value of this object is the state of the CM authorization FSM. The start state indicates that FSM is in its initial state.

docsBpi2CmAuthKeySequenceNumber.name: docsBpi2CmAuthKeySequenceNumber
docsBpi2CmAuthKeySequenceNumber.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.2 and 4.2.2.10.
docsBpi2CmAuthKeySequenceNumber.description: The value of this object is the most recent authorization key sequence number for this FSM.

docsBpi2CmAuthExpiresOld.name: docsBpi2CmAuthExpiresOld
docsBpi2CmAuthExpiresOld.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.2 and 4.2.2.9.
docsBpi2CmAuthExpiresOld.description: The value of this object is the actual clock time for expiration of the immediate predecessor of the most recent authorization key for this FSM. If this FSM has only one authorization key, then the value is the time of activation of this FSM.

docsBpi2CmAuthExpiresNew.name: docsBpi2CmAuthExpiresNew
docsBpi2CmAuthExpiresNew.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.2 and 4.2.2.9.
docsBpi2CmAuthExpiresNew.description: The value of this object is the actual clock time for expiration of the most recent authorization key for this FSM.

docsBpi2CmAuthReset.name: docsBpi2CmAuthReset
docsBpi2CmAuthReset.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.1.2.3.4.
docsBpi2CmAuthReset.description: Setting this object to TRUE generates a Reauthorize event in the authorization FSM. Reading this object always returns FALSE.

docsBpi2CmAuthGraceTime.name: docsBpi2CmAuthGraceTime
docsBpi2CmAuthGraceTime.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Appendix A.1.1.1.3.
docsBpi2CmAuthGraceTime.description: The value of this object is the grace time for an authorization key. A CM is expected to start trying to get a new authorization key beginning AuthGraceTime seconds before the authorization key actually expires.

docsBpi2CmTEKGraceTime.name: docsBpi2CmTEKGraceTime
docsBpi2CmTEKGraceTime.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Appendix A.1.1.1.6.
docsBpi2CmTEKGraceTime.description: The value of this object is the grace time for the TEK in seconds. The CM is expected to start trying to acquire a new TEK beginning TEK GraceTime seconds before the expiration of the most recent TEK.

docsBpi2CmAuthWaitTimeout.name: docsBpi2CmAuthWaitTimeout
docsBpi2CmAuthWaitTimeout.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Appendix A.1.1.1.1.
docsBpi2CmAuthWaitTimeout.description: The value of this object is the Authorize Wait Timeout.

docsBpi2CmReauthWaitTimeout.name: docsBpi2CmReauthWaitTimeout
docsBpi2CmReauthWaitTimeout.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Appendix A.1.1.1.2.
docsBpi2CmReauthWaitTimeout.description: The value of this object is the Reauthorize Wait Timeout in seconds.

docsBpi2CmOpWaitTimeout.name: docsBpi2CmOpWaitTimeout
docsBpi2CmOpWaitTimeout.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Appendix A.1.1.1.4.
docsBpi2CmOpWaitTimeout.description: The value of this object is the Operational Wait Timeout in seconds.

docsBpi2CmRekeyWaitTimeout.name: docsBpi2CmRekeyWaitTimeout
docsBpi2CmRekeyWaitTimeout.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Appendix A.1.1.1.5.
docsBpi2CmRekeyWaitTimeout.description: The value of this object is the Rekey Wait Timeout in seconds.

docsBpi2CmAuthRejectWaitTimeout.name: docsBpi2CmAuthRejectWaitTimeout
docsBpi2CmAuthRejectWaitTimeout.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Appendix A.1.1.1.7.
docsBpi2CmAuthRejectWaitTimeout.description: The value of this object is the Authorization Reject Wait Timeout in seconds.

docsBpi2CmSAMapWaitTimeout.name: docsBpi2CmSAMapWaitTimeout
docsBpi2CmSAMapWaitTimeout.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Appendix A.1.1.1.8.
docsBpi2CmSAMapWaitTimeout.description: The value of this object is the retransmission interval, in seconds, of SA Map Requests from the MAP Wait state.

docsBpi2CmSAMapMaxRetries.name: docsBpi2CmSAMapMaxRetries
docsBpi2CmSAMapMaxRetries.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Appendix A.1.1.1.9.
docsBpi2CmSAMapMaxRetries.description: The value of this object is the maximum number of Map Request retries allowed.

docsBpi2CmAuthentInfos.name: docsBpi2CmAuthentInfos
docsBpi2CmAuthentInfos.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.9.
docsBpi2CmAuthentInfos.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CM has transmitted an Authentication Information message.

docsBpi2CmAuthRequests.name: docsBpi2CmAuthRequests
docsBpi2CmAuthRequests.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.1.
docsBpi2CmAuthRequests.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CM has transmitted an Authorization Request message.

docsBpi2CmAuthReplies.name: docsBpi2CmAuthReplies
docsBpi2CmAuthReplies.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.2.
docsBpi2CmAuthReplies.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CM has received an Authorization Reply message.

docsBpi2CmAuthRejects.name: docsBpi2CmAuthRejects
docsBpi2CmAuthRejects.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.3.
docsBpi2CmAuthRejects.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CM has received an Authorization Reject message.

docsBpi2CmAuthInvalids.name: docsBpi2CmAuthInvalids
docsBpi2CmAuthInvalids.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.7.
docsBpi2CmAuthInvalids.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CM has received an Authorization Invalid message.

docsBpi2CmAuthRejectErrorCode.name: docsBpi2CmAuthRejectErrorCode
docsBpi2CmAuthRejectErrorCode.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.3 and 4.2.2.15.
docsBpi2CmAuthRejectErrorCode.description: The value of this object is the enumerated description of the Error-Code in most recent Authorization Reject message received by the CM. This has value unknown(2) if the last Error-Code value was 0, and none(1) if no Authorization Reject message has been received since reboot.

docsBpi2CmAuthRejectErrorString.name: docsBpi2CmAuthRejectErrorString
docsBpi2CmAuthRejectErrorString.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.3 and 4.2.2.6.
docsBpi2CmAuthRejectErrorString.description: The value of this object is the Display-String in most recent Authorization Reject message received by the CM. This is a zero length string if no Authorization Reject message has been received since reboot.

docsBpi2CmAuthInvalidErrorCode.name: docsBpi2CmAuthInvalidErrorCode
docsBpi2CmAuthInvalidErrorCode.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.7 and 4.2.2.15.
docsBpi2CmAuthInvalidErrorCode.description: The value of this object is the enumerated description of the Error-Code in most recent Authorization Invalid message received by the CM. This has value unknown(2) if the last Error-Code value was 0, and none(1) if no Authorization Invalid message has been received since reboot.

docsBpi2CmAuthInvalidErrorString.name: docsBpi2CmAuthInvalidErrorString
docsBpi2CmAuthInvalidErrorString.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.7 and 4.2.2.6.
docsBpi2CmAuthInvalidErrorString.description: The value of this object is the Display-String in most recent Authorization Invalid message received by the CM. This is a zero length string if no Authorization Invalid message has been received since reboot.

docsBpi2CmTEKTable.name: docsBpi2CmTEKTable
docsBpi2CmTEKTable.description: This table describes the attributes of each CM Traffic Encryption Key(TEK) association. The CM maintains (no more than) one TEK association per SAID per CM MAC interface.

docsBpi2CmTEKEntry.name: docsBpi2CmTEKEntry
docsBpi2CmTEKEntry.description: Each entry contains objects describing the TEK association attributes of one SAID. The CM MUST create one entry per SAID, regardless of whether the SAID was obtained from a Registration Response message, from an Authorization Reply message, or from any dynamic SAID establishment mechanisms.

docsBpi2CmTEKSAId.name: docsBpi2CmTEKSAId
docsBpi2CmTEKSAId.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.2.12.
docsBpi2CmTEKSAId.description: The value of this object is the DOCSIS Security Association ID (SAID).

docsBpi2CmTEKSAType.name: docsBpi2CmTEKSAType
docsBpi2CmTEKSAType.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 2.1.3.
docsBpi2CmTEKSAType.description: The value of this object is the type of security association.

docsBpi2CmTEKDataEncryptAlg.name: docsBpi2CmTEKDataEncryptAlg
docsBpi2CmTEKDataEncryptAlg.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.2.20.
docsBpi2CmTEKDataEncryptAlg.description: The value of this object is the data encryption algorithm being utilized.

docsBpi2CmTEKDataAuthentAlg.name: docsBpi2CmTEKDataAuthentAlg
docsBpi2CmTEKDataAuthentAlg.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.2.20.
docsBpi2CmTEKDataAuthentAlg.description: The value of this object is the data authentication algorithm being utilized.

docsBpi2CmTEKState.name: docsBpi2CmTEKState
docsBpi2CmTEKState.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.1.3.1.
docsBpi2CmTEKState.description: The value of this object is the state of the indicated TEK FSM. The start(1) state indicates that FSM is in its initial state.

docsBpi2CmTEKKeySequenceNumber.name: docsBpi2CmTEKKeySequenceNumber
docsBpi2CmTEKKeySequenceNumber.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.2.10 and 4.2.2.13.
docsBpi2CmTEKKeySequenceNumber.description: The value of this object is the most recent TEK key sequence number for this TEK FSM.

docsBpi2CmTEKExpiresOld.name: docsBpi2CmTEKExpiresOld
docsBpi2CmTEKExpiresOld.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.5 and 4.2.2.9.
docsBpi2CmTEKExpiresOld.description: The value of this object is the actual clock time for expiration of the immediate predecessor of the most recent TEK for this FSM. If this FSM has only one TEK, then the value is the time of activation of this FSM.

docsBpi2CmTEKExpiresNew.name: docsBpi2CmTEKExpiresNew
docsBpi2CmTEKExpiresNew.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.5 and 4.2.2.9.
docsBpi2CmTEKExpiresNew.description: The value of this object is the actual clock time for expiration of the most recent TEK for this FSM.

docsBpi2CmTEKKeyRequests.name: docsBpi2CmTEKKeyRequests
docsBpi2CmTEKKeyRequests.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.4.
docsBpi2CmTEKKeyRequests.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CM has transmitted a Key Request message.

docsBpi2CmTEKKeyReplies.name: docsBpi2CmTEKKeyReplies
docsBpi2CmTEKKeyReplies.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.5.
docsBpi2CmTEKKeyReplies.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CM has received a Key Reply message, including a message whose authentication failed.

docsBpi2CmTEKKeyRejects.name: docsBpi2CmTEKKeyRejects
docsBpi2CmTEKKeyRejects.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.6.
docsBpi2CmTEKKeyRejects.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CM has received a Key Reject message, including a message whose authentication failed.

docsBpi2CmTEKInvalids.name: docsBpi2CmTEKInvalids
docsBpi2CmTEKInvalids.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.8.
docsBpi2CmTEKInvalids.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CM has received a TEK Invalid message, including a message whose authentication failed.

docsBpi2CmTEKAuthPends.name: docsBpi2CmTEKAuthPends
docsBpi2CmTEKAuthPends.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.1.3.3.3.
docsBpi2CmTEKAuthPends.description: The value of this object is the count of times an Authorization Pending (Auth Pend) event occurred in this FSM.

docsBpi2CmTEKKeyRejectErrorCode.name: docsBpi2CmTEKKeyRejectErrorCode
docsBpi2CmTEKKeyRejectErrorCode.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.1.2.6 and 4.2.2.15.
docsBpi2CmTEKKeyRejectErrorCode.description: The value of this object is the enumerated description of the Error-Code in most recent Key Reject message received by the CM. This has value unknown(2) if the last Error-Code value was 0, and none(1) if no Key Reject message has been received since reboot.

docsBpi2CmTEKKeyRejectErrorString.name: docsBpi2CmTEKKeyRejectErrorString
docsBpi2CmTEKKeyRejectErrorString.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.1.2.6 and 4.2.2.6.
docsBpi2CmTEKKeyRejectErrorString.description: The value of this object is the Display-String in most recent Key Reject message received by the CM. This is a zero length string if no Key Reject message has been received since reboot.

docsBpi2CmTEKInvalidErrorCode.name: docsBpi2CmTEKInvalidErrorCode
docsBpi2CmTEKInvalidErrorCode.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.1.2.8 and 4.2.2.15.
docsBpi2CmTEKInvalidErrorCode.description: The value of this object is the enumerated description of the Error-Code in most recent TEK Invalid message received by the CM. This has value unknown(2) if the last Error-Code value was 0, and none(1) if no TEK Invalid message has been received since reboot.

docsBpi2CmTEKInvalidErrorString.name: docsBpi2CmTEKInvalidErrorString
docsBpi2CmTEKInvalidErrorString.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.1.2.8 and 4.2.2.6.
docsBpi2CmTEKInvalidErrorString.description: The value of this object is the Display-String in most recent TEK Invalid message received by the CM. This is a zero length string if no TEK Invalid message has been received since reboot.

docsBpi2CmIpMulticastMapTable.name: docsBpi2CmIpMulticastMapTable
docsBpi2CmIpMulticastMapTable.description: This table maps multicast IP addresses to SAIDs. It is intended to map multicast IP addresses associated with SA MAP Request messages.

docsBpi2CmIpMulticastMapEntry.name: docsBpi2CmIpMulticastMapEntry
docsBpi2CmIpMulticastMapEntry.description: Each entry contains objects describing the mapping of one multicast IP address to one SAID, as well as associated state, message counters, and error information.

docsBpi2CmIpMulticastAddressType.name: docsBpi2CmIpMulticastAddressType
docsBpi2CmIpMulticastAddressType.description: The type of internet address for docsBpi2CmIpMulticastAddress.

docsBpi2CmIpMulticastAddress.name: docsBpi2CmIpMulticastAddress
docsBpi2CmIpMulticastAddress.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 5.4.
docsBpi2CmIpMulticastAddress.description: This object represents the IP multicast address to be mapped.

docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAId.name: docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAId
docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAId.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.2.12.
docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAId.description: This object represents the SAID to which the IP multicast address has been mapped. If no SA Map Reply has been received for the IP address, this object should have the value 0.

docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapState.name: docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapState
docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapState.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 5.3.1.
docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapState.description: The value of this object is the state of the SA Mapping FSM for this IP.

docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapRequests.name: docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapRequests
docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapRequests.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.10.
docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapRequests.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CM has transmitted an SA Map Request message for this IP.

docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapReplies.name: docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapReplies
docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapReplies.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.11.
docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapReplies.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CM has received an SA Map Reply message for this IP.

docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapRejects.name: docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapRejects
docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapRejects.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.12.
docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapRejects.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CM has received an SA MAP Reject message for this IP.

docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapRejectErrorCod.name: docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapRejectErrorCode
docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapRejectErrorCod.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.12 and 4.2.2.15.
docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapRejectErrorCod.description: The value of this object is the enumerated description of the Error-Code in the most recent SA Map Reject message sent in response to an SA Map Request for this IP. It has value unknown(2) if the last Error-Code value was 0, and none(1) if no SA MAP Reject message has been received since reboot.

docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapRejectErrorStr.name: docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapRejectErrorString
docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapRejectErrorStr.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.12 and 4.2.2.6.
docsBpi2CmIpMulticastSAMapRejectErrorStr.description: The value of this object is the Display-String in the most recent SA Map Reject message sent in response to an SA Map Request for this IP. It is a zero length string if no SA Map Reject message has been received since reboot.

docsBpi2CmDeviceCertTable.name: docsBpi2CmDeviceCertTable
docsBpi2CmDeviceCertTable.description: This table describes the Baseline Privacy Plus device certificates for each CM MAC interface.

docsBpi2CmDeviceCertEntry.name: docsBpi2CmDeviceCertEntry
docsBpi2CmDeviceCertEntry.description: Each entry contains the device certificates of one CM MAC interface. An entry in this table exists for each ifEntry with an ifType of docsCableMaclayer(127).

docsBpi2CmDeviceCmCert.name: docsBpi2CmDeviceCmCert
docsBpi2CmDeviceCmCert.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 9.1.
docsBpi2CmDeviceCmCert.description: The X509 DER-encoded cable modem certificate. Note: This object can be set only when the value is the null string. Once the object contains the certificate, its access MUST be read-only.

docsBpi2CmDeviceManufCert.name: docsBpi2CmDeviceManufCert
docsBpi2CmDeviceManufCert.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 9.1.
docsBpi2CmDeviceManufCert.description: The X509 DER-encoded manufacturer certificate which signed the cable modem certificate.

docsBpi2CmCryptoSuiteTable.name: docsBpi2CmCryptoSuiteTable
docsBpi2CmCryptoSuiteTable.description: This table describes the Baseline Privacy Plus cryptographic suite capabilites for each CM MAC interface.

docsBpi2CmCryptoSuiteEntry.name: docsBpi2CmCryptoSuiteEntry
docsBpi2CmCryptoSuiteEntry.description: Each entry contains a cryptographic suite pair which this CM MAC supports.

docsBpi2CmCryptoSuiteIndex.name: docsBpi2CmCryptoSuiteIndex
docsBpi2CmCryptoSuiteIndex.description: The index for a cryptographic suite row.

docsBpi2CmCryptoSuiteDataEncryptAlg.name: docsBpi2CmCryptoSuiteDataEncryptAlg
docsBpi2CmCryptoSuiteDataEncryptAlg.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.2.20.
docsBpi2CmCryptoSuiteDataEncryptAlg.description: The value of this object is the data encryption algorithm for this cryptographic suite capability.

docsBpi2CmCryptoSuiteDataAuthentAlg.name: docsBpi2CmCryptoSuiteDataAuthentAlg
docsBpi2CmCryptoSuiteDataAuthentAlg.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.2.20.
docsBpi2CmCryptoSuiteDataAuthentAlg.description: The value of this object is the data authentication algorithm for this cryptographic suite capability.

docsBpi2CmtsBaseTable.name: docsBpi2CmtsBaseTable
docsBpi2CmtsBaseTable.description: This table describes the basic Baseline Privacy attributes of each CMTS MAC interface.

docsBpi2CmtsBaseEntry.name: docsBpi2CmtsBaseEntry
docsBpi2CmtsBaseEntry.description: Each entry contains objects describing attributes of one CMTS MAC interface. An entry in this table exists for each ifEntry with an ifType of docsCableMaclayer(127).

docsBpi2CmtsDefaultAuthLifetime.name: docsBpi2CmtsDefaultAuthLifetime
docsBpi2CmtsDefaultAuthLifetime.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Appendix A.2.
docsBpi2CmtsDefaultAuthLifetime.description: The value of this object is the default lifetime, in seconds, the CMTS assigns to a new authorization key.

docsBpi2CmtsDefaultTEKLifetime.name: docsBpi2CmtsDefaultTEKLifetime
docsBpi2CmtsDefaultTEKLifetime.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Appendix A.2.
docsBpi2CmtsDefaultTEKLifetime.description: The value of this object is the default lifetime, in seconds, the CMTS assigns to a new Traffic Encryption Key (TEK).

docsBpi2CmtsDefaultSelfSignedManufCertTr.name: docsBpi2CmtsDefaultSelfSignedManufCertTrust
docsBpi2CmtsDefaultSelfSignedManufCertTr.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 9.4.1
docsBpi2CmtsDefaultSelfSignedManufCertTr.description: This object determines the default trust of all (new) self-signed manufacturer certificates obtained after setting the object.

docsBpi2CmtsCheckCertValidityPeriods.name: docsBpi2CmtsCheckCertValidityPeriods
docsBpi2CmtsCheckCertValidityPeriods.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 9.4.2
docsBpi2CmtsCheckCertValidityPeriods.description: Setting this object to TRUE causes all certificates obtained thereafter to have their validity periods (and their chain's validity periods) checked against the current time of day. A FALSE setting will cause all certificates obtained thereafter to not have their validity periods (nor their chain's validity periods) checked against the current time of day.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthentInfos.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthentInfos
docsBpi2CmtsAuthentInfos.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.9.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthentInfos.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CMTS has received an Authentication Information message from any CM.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthRequests.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthRequests
docsBpi2CmtsAuthRequests.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.1.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthRequests.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CMTS has received an Authorization Request message from any CM.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthReplies.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthReplies
docsBpi2CmtsAuthReplies.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.2.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthReplies.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CMTS has transmitted an Authorization Reply message to any CM.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthRejects.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthRejects
docsBpi2CmtsAuthRejects.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.3.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthRejects.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CMTS has transmitted an Authorization Reject message to any CM.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthInvalids.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthInvalids
docsBpi2CmtsAuthInvalids.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.7.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthInvalids.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CMTS has transmitted an Authorization Invalid message to any CM.

docsBpi2CmtsSAMapRequests.name: docsBpi2CmtsSAMapRequests
docsBpi2CmtsSAMapRequests.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.10.
docsBpi2CmtsSAMapRequests.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CMTS has received an SA Map Request message from any CM.

docsBpi2CmtsSAMapReplies.name: docsBpi2CmtsSAMapReplies
docsBpi2CmtsSAMapReplies.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.11.
docsBpi2CmtsSAMapReplies.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CMTS has transmitted an SA Map Reply message to any CM.

docsBpi2CmtsSAMapRejects.name: docsBpi2CmtsSAMapRejects
docsBpi2CmtsSAMapRejects.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.12.
docsBpi2CmtsSAMapRejects.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CMTS has transmitted an SA Map Reject message to any CM.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthTable.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthTable
docsBpi2CmtsAuthTable.description: This table describes the attributes of each CM authorization association. The CMTS maintains one authorization association with each Baseline Privacy-enabled CM on each CMTS MAC interface.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthEntry.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthEntry
docsBpi2CmtsAuthEntry.description: Each entry contains objects describing attributes of one authorization association. The CMTS MUST create one entry per CM per MAC interface, based on the receipt of an Authorization Request message, and MUST not delete the entry before the CM authorization permanently expires.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmMacAddress.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmMacAddress
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmMacAddress.description: The value of this object is the physical address of the CM to which the authorization association applies.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmBpiVersion.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmBpiVersion
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmBpiVersion.description: The value of this object is the version of Baseline Privacy for which this CM has registered.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmPublicKey.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmPublicKey
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmPublicKey.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.2.4.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmPublicKey.description: The value of this object is a DER-encoded RSAPublicKey ASN.1 type string, as defined in the RSA Encryption Standard (PKCS #1) [10], corresponding to the public key of the CM. The 74, 106, 140, 204, and 270 byte key encoding lengths correspond to 512 bit, 768 bit, 1024 bit, 1536 bit, and 2048 public moduli respectively. This is a zero-length string if the CMTS does not retain the public key.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmKeySequenceNumber.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmKeySequenceNumber
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmKeySequenceNumber.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.2 and 4.2.2.10.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmKeySequenceNumber.description: The value of this object is the most recent authorization key sequence number for this CM.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmExpiresOld.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmExpiresOld
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmExpiresOld.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.2 and 4.2.2.9.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmExpiresOld.description: The value of this object is the actual clock time for expiration of the immediate predecessor of the most recent authorization key for this FSM. If this FSM has only one authorization key, then the value is the time of activation of this FSM. Note: For CMs running in BPI mode, implementation of this object is optional and MAY vary.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmExpiresNew.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmExpiresNew
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmExpiresNew.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.2 and 4.2.2.9.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmExpiresNew.description: The value of this object is the actual clock time for expiration of the most recent authorization key for this FSM.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmLifetime.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmLifetime
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmLifetime.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.2 and Appendix A.2.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmLifetime.description: The value of this object is the lifetime, in seconds, the CMTS assigns to an authorization key for this CM.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmGraceTime.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmGraceTime
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmGraceTime.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Appendix A.1.1.1.3.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmGraceTime.description: The value of this object is the grace time for the authorization key in seconds. The CM is expected to start trying to get a new authorization key beginning AuthGraceTime seconds before the authorization key actually expires. Note: Tracking this value is optional on certain CMTS implementations.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmReset.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmReset
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmReset.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.1.2.3.4, 4.1.2.3.5, and 4.1.3.3.5.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmReset.description: Setting this object to invalidateAuth(2) causes the CMTS to invalidate the current CM authorization key(s), but not to transmit an Authorization Invalid message nor to invalidate unicast TEKs. Setting this object to sendAuthInvalid(3) causes the CMTS to invalidate the current CM authorization key(s), and to transmit an Authorization Invalid message to the CM, but not to invalidate unicast TEKs. Setting this object to invalidateTeks(4) causes the CMTS to invalidate the current CM authorization key(s), to transmit an Authorization Invalid message to the CM, and to invalidate all unicast TEKs associated with this CM authorization. Reading this object returns the most-recently-set value of this object, or returns noResetRequested(1) if the object has not been set since the last CMTS reboot.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmInfos.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmInfos
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmInfos.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.9.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmInfos.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CMTS has received an Authentication Information message from this CM.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmRequests.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmRequests
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmRequests.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.1.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmRequests.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CMTS has received an Authorization Request message from this CM.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmReplies.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmReplies
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmReplies.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.2.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmReplies.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CMTS has transmitted an Authorization Reply message to this CM.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmRejects.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmRejects
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmRejects.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.3.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmRejects.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CMTS has transmitted an Authorization Reject message to this CM.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmInvalids.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmInvalids
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmInvalids.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.7.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmInvalids.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CMTS has transmitted an Authorization Invalid message to this CM.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthRejectErrorCode.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthRejectErrorCode
docsBpi2CmtsAuthRejectErrorCode.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.3 and 4.2.2.15.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthRejectErrorCode.description: The value of this object is the enumerated description of the Error-Code in most recent Authorization Reject message transmitted to the CM. This has value unknown(2) if the last Error-Code value was 0, and none(1) if no Authorization Reject message has been transmitted to the CM.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthRejectErrorString.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthRejectErrorString
docsBpi2CmtsAuthRejectErrorString.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.3 and 4.2.2.6.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthRejectErrorString.description: The value of this object is the Display-String in most recent Authorization Reject message transmitted to the CM. This is a zero length string if no Authorization Reject message has been transmitted to the CM.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthInvalidErrorCode.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthInvalidErrorCode
docsBpi2CmtsAuthInvalidErrorCode.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.7 and 4.2.2.15.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthInvalidErrorCode.description: The value of this object is the enumerated description of the Error-Code in most recent Authorization Invalid message transmitted to the CM. This has value unknown(2) if the last Error-Code value was 0, and none(1) if no Authorization Invalid message has been transmitted to the CM.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthInvalidErrorString.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthInvalidErrorString
docsBpi2CmtsAuthInvalidErrorString.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.7 and 4.2.2.6.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthInvalidErrorString.description: The value of this object is the Display-String in most recent Authorization Invalid message transmitted to the CM. This is a zero length string if no Authorization Invalid message has been transmitted to the CM.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthPrimarySAId.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthPrimarySAId
docsBpi2CmtsAuthPrimarySAId.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 2.1.3.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthPrimarySAId.description: The value of this object is the Primary Security Association identifier.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthBpkmCmCertValid.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthBpkmCmCertValid
docsBpi2CmtsAuthBpkmCmCertValid.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 9.4.2.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthBpkmCmCertValid.description: Contains the reason why a CM's certificate is deemed valid or invalid. Return unknown if the CM is running BPI mode. ValidCmChained means the certificate is valid because it chains to a valid certificate. ValidCmTrusted means the certificate is valid because it has been provisioned (in the docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCert table) to be trusted. InvalidCmUntrusted means the certificate is invalid because it has been provisioned (in the docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCert table) to be untrusted. InvalidCAUntrusted means the certificate is invalid because it chains to an untrusted certificate. InvalidCmOther and InvalidCAOther refer to errors in parsing, validity periods, etc, which are attributable to the cm certificate or its chain respectively; additional information may be found in docsBpi2AuthRejectErrorString for these types of errors.

docsBpi2CmtsAuthBpkmCmCert.name: docsBpi2CmtsAuthBpkmCmCert
docsBpi2CmtsAuthBpkmCmCert.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 9.2.
docsBpi2CmtsAuthBpkmCmCert.description: The X509 CM Certificate sent as part of a BPKM Authorization Request. Note: The NULL string must be returned if the entire certificate is not retained in the CMTS.

docsBpi2CmtsTEKTable.name: docsBpi2CmtsTEKTable
docsBpi2CmtsTEKTable.description: This table describes the attributes of each Traffic Encryption Key (TEK) association. The CMTS maintains one TEK association per SAID on each CMTS MAC interface.

docsBpi2CmtsTEKEntry.name: docsBpi2CmtsTEKEntry
docsBpi2CmtsTEKEntry.description: Each entry contains objects describing attributes of one TEK association on a particular CMTS MAC interface. The CMTS MUST create one entry per SAID per MAC interface, based on the receipt of a Key Request message, and MUST not delete the entry before the CM authorization for the SAID permanently expires.

docsBpi2CmtsTEKSAId.name: docsBpi2CmtsTEKSAId
docsBpi2CmtsTEKSAId.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.2.12.
docsBpi2CmtsTEKSAId.description: The value of this object is the DOCSIS Security Association ID (SAID).

docsBpi2CmtsTEKSAType.name: docsBpi2CmtsTEKSAType
docsBpi2CmtsTEKSAType.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 2.1.3.
docsBpi2CmtsTEKSAType.description: The value of this object is the type of security association. Dynamic does not apply to CMs running in BPI mode.

docsBpi2CmtsTEKDataEncryptAlg.name: docsBpi2CmtsTEKDataEncryptAlg
docsBpi2CmtsTEKDataEncryptAlg.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.2.20.
docsBpi2CmtsTEKDataEncryptAlg.description: The value of this object is the data encryption algorithm being utilized.

docsBpi2CmtsTEKDataAuthentAlg.name: docsBpi2CmtsTEKDataAuthentAlg
docsBpi2CmtsTEKDataAuthentAlg.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.2.20.
docsBpi2CmtsTEKDataAuthentAlg.description: The value of this object is the data authentication algorithm being utilized.

docsBpi2CmtsTEKLifetime.name: docsBpi2CmtsTEKLifetime
docsBpi2CmtsTEKLifetime.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.5 and Appendix A.2.
docsBpi2CmtsTEKLifetime.description: The value of this object is the lifetime, in seconds, the CMTS assigns to keys for this TEK association.

docsBpi2CmtsTEKGraceTime.name: docsBpi2CmtsTEKGraceTime
docsBpi2CmtsTEKGraceTime.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Appendix A.1.1.1.6.
docsBpi2CmtsTEKGraceTime.description: The value of this object is the grace time for the TEK in seconds. The CM is expected to start trying to acquire a new TEK beginning TEK GraceTime seconds before the TEK actually expires. Note: The value of this object is vendor specific for multicast TEKs.

docsBpi2CmtsTEKKeySequenceNumber.name: docsBpi2CmtsTEKKeySequenceNumber
docsBpi2CmtsTEKKeySequenceNumber.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.2.10 and 4.2.2.13.
docsBpi2CmtsTEKKeySequenceNumber.description: The value of this object is the most recent TEK key sequence number for this SAID.

docsBpi2CmtsTEKExpiresOld.name: docsBpi2CmtsTEKExpiresOld
docsBpi2CmtsTEKExpiresOld.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.5 and 4.2.2.9.
docsBpi2CmtsTEKExpiresOld.description: The value of this object is the actual clock time for expiration of the immediate predecessor of the most recent TEK for this FSM. If this FSM has only one TEK, then the value is the time of activation of this FSM.

docsBpi2CmtsTEKExpiresNew.name: docsBpi2CmtsTEKExpiresNew
docsBpi2CmtsTEKExpiresNew.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.5 and 4.2.2.9.
docsBpi2CmtsTEKExpiresNew.description: The value of this object is the actual clock time for expiration of the most recent TEK for this FSM.

docsBpi2CmtsTEKReset.name: docsBpi2CmtsTEKReset
docsBpi2CmtsTEKReset.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.1.3.3.5.
docsBpi2CmtsTEKReset.description: Setting this object to TRUE causes the CMTS to invalidate the current active TEK(s) (plural due to key transition periods), and to generate a new TEK for the associated SAID; the CMTS MAY also generate an unsolicited TEK Invalid message, to optimize the TEK synchronization between the CMTS and the CM. Reading this object always returns FALSE.

docsBpi2CmtsKeyRequests.name: docsBpi2CmtsKeyRequests
docsBpi2CmtsKeyRequests.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.4.
docsBpi2CmtsKeyRequests.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CMTS has received a Key Request message.

docsBpi2CmtsKeyReplies.name: docsBpi2CmtsKeyReplies
docsBpi2CmtsKeyReplies.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.5.
docsBpi2CmtsKeyReplies.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CMTS has transmitted a Key Reply message.

docsBpi2CmtsKeyRejects.name: docsBpi2CmtsKeyRejects
docsBpi2CmtsKeyRejects.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.6.
docsBpi2CmtsKeyRejects.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CMTS has transmitted a Key Reject message.

docsBpi2CmtsTEKInvalids.name: docsBpi2CmtsTEKInvalids
docsBpi2CmtsTEKInvalids.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.8.
docsBpi2CmtsTEKInvalids.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CMTS has transmitted a TEK Invalid message.

docsBpi2CmtsKeyRejectErrorCode.name: docsBpi2CmtsKeyRejectErrorCode
docsBpi2CmtsKeyRejectErrorCode.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.6 and 4.2.2.15.
docsBpi2CmtsKeyRejectErrorCode.description: The value of this object is the enumerated description of the Error-Code in the most recent Key Reject message sent in response to a Key Request for this SAID. This has value unknown(2) if the last Error-Code value was 0, and none(1) if no Key Reject message has been received since reboot.

docsBpi2CmtsKeyRejectErrorString.name: docsBpi2CmtsKeyRejectErrorString
docsBpi2CmtsKeyRejectErrorString.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.6 and 4.2.2.6.
docsBpi2CmtsKeyRejectErrorString.description: The value of this object is the Display-String in the most recent Key Reject message sent in response to a Key Request for this SAID. This is a zero length string if no Key Reject message has been received since reboot.

docsBpi2CmtsTEKInvalidErrorCode.name: docsBpi2CmtsTEKInvalidErrorCode
docsBpi2CmtsTEKInvalidErrorCode.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.8 and 4.2.2.15.
docsBpi2CmtsTEKInvalidErrorCode.description: The value of this object is the enumerated description of the Error-Code in the most recent TEK Invalid message sent in association with this SAID. This has value unknown(2) if the last Error-Code value was 0, and none(1) if no TEK Invalid message has been received since reboot.

docsBpi2CmtsTEKInvalidErrorString.name: docsBpi2CmtsTEKInvalidErrorString
docsBpi2CmtsTEKInvalidErrorString.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.8 and 4.2.2.6.
docsBpi2CmtsTEKInvalidErrorString.description: The value of this object is the Display-String in the most recent TEK Invalid message sent in association with this SAID. This is a zero length string if no TEK Invalid message has been received since reboot.

docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMapTable.name: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMapTable
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMapTable.description: This table maps multicast IP addresses to SAIDs.

docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMapEntry.name: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMapEntry
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMapEntry.description: Each entry contains objects describing the mapping of a set of multicast IP address and mask to one SAID, as well as associated message counters and error information.

docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastAddressType.name: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastAddressType
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastAddressType.description: The type of internet address for docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastAddress.

docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastAddress.name: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastAddress
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastAddress.description: This object represents the IP multicast address to be mapped, in conjunction with docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMask.

docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMaskType.name: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMaskType
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMaskType.description: The type of internet address for docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMask.

docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMask.name: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMask
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMask.description: This object represents the IP multicast address mask for this row. An IP multicast address matches this row if it is equivalent to the logical AND of docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastAddr with docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMask.

docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAId.name: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAId
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAId.description: This object represents the multicast SAID to be used in this IP multicast address mapping entry.

docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAType.name: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAType
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAType.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 2.1.3.
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAType.description: The value of this object is the type of security association. Dynamic does not apply to CMs running in BPI mode.

docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastDataEncryptAlg.name: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastDataEncryptAlg
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastDataEncryptAlg.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.2.20.
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastDataEncryptAlg.description: The value of this object is the data encryption algorithm being utilized.

docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastDataAuthentAlg.name: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastDataAuthentAlg
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastDataAuthentAlg.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.2.20.
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastDataAuthentAlg.description: The value of this object is the data authentication algorithm being utilized.

docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAMapRequests.name: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAMapRequests
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAMapRequests.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.10.
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAMapRequests.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CMTS has received an SA Map Request message for this IP.

docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAMapReplies.name: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAMapReplies
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAMapReplies.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.11.
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAMapReplies.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CMTS has transmitted an SA Map Reply message for this IP.

docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAMapRejects.name: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAMapRejects
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAMapRejects.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 4.2.1.12.
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAMapRejects.description: The value of this object is the count of times the CMTS has transmitted an SA Map Reject message for this IP.

docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAMapRejectErrorC.name: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAMapRejectErrorCode
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAMapRejectErrorC.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.12 and 4.2.2.15.
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAMapRejectErrorC.description: The value of this object is the enumerated description of the Error-Code in the most recent SA Map Reject message sent in response to a SA Map Request for this IP. It has value unknown(2) if the last Error-Code value was 0, and none(1) if no SA MAP Reject message has been received since reboot.

docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAMapRejectErrorS.name: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAMapRejectErrorString
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAMapRejectErrorS.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Sections 4.2.1.12 and 4.2.2.6.
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAMapRejectErrorS.description: The value of this object is the Display-String in the most recent SA Map Reject message sent in response to an SA Map Request for this IP. It is a zero length string if no SA Map Reject message has been received since reboot.

docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMapControl.name: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMapControl
docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMapControl.description: This object controls and reflects the IP multicast address mapping entry. There is no restriction on the ability to change values in this row while the row is active. Inactive rows need not be timed out.

docsBpi2CmtsMulticastAuthTable.name: docsBpi2CmtsMulticastAuthTable
docsBpi2CmtsMulticastAuthTable.description: This table describes the multicast SAID authorization for each CM on each CMTS MAC interface.

docsBpi2CmtsMulticastAuthEntry.name: docsBpi2CmtsMulticastAuthEntry
docsBpi2CmtsMulticastAuthEntry.description: Each entry contains objects describing the key authorization of one cable modem for one multicast SAID for one CMTS MAC interface.

docsBpi2CmtsMulticastAuthSAId.name: docsBpi2CmtsMulticastAuthSAId
docsBpi2CmtsMulticastAuthSAId.description: This object represents the multicast SAID for authorization.

docsBpi2CmtsMulticastAuthCmMacAddress.name: docsBpi2CmtsMulticastAuthCmMacAddress
docsBpi2CmtsMulticastAuthCmMacAddress.description: This object represents the MAC address of the CM to which the multicast SAID authorization applies.

docsBpi2CmtsMulticastAuthControl.name: docsBpi2CmtsMulticastAuthControl
docsBpi2CmtsMulticastAuthControl.description: This object controls and reflects the CM authorization for each multicast SAID. There is no restriction on the ability to change values in this row while the row is active. Inactive rows need not be timed out.

docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertTable.name: docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertTable
docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertTable.description: A table of CM certificate trust entries provisioned to the CMTS. The trust object for a certificate in this table has an overriding effect on the validity object of a certificate in the authorization table, as long as the entire contents of the two certificates are identical.

docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertEntry.name: docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertEntry
docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertEntry.description: An entry in the CMTS' provisioned CM certificate table.

docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertTrust.name: docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertTrust
docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertTrust.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 9.4.1.
docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertTrust.description: Trust state for the provisioned CM certificate entry. Note: Setting this object need only override the validity of CM certificates sent in future authorization requests; instantaneous effect need not occur.

docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertSource.name: docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertSource
docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertSource.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 9.4.1.
docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertSource.description: This object indicates how the certificate reached the CMTS. Other means it originated from a source not identified above.

docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertStatus.name: docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertStatus
docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertStatus.description: Standard RowStatus object except: a) if a row has ever been activated, a set to docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCert need not succeed, b) inactive rows need not be timed out.

docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCert.name: docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCert
docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCert.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 9.2.
docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCert.description: An X509 DER-encoded certificate authority certificate. Note: The NULL string must be returned, on reads, if the entire certificate is not retained in the CMTS.

docsBpi2CmtsCACertTable.name: docsBpi2CmtsCACertTable
docsBpi2CmtsCACertTable.description: The table of known certificate authority certificates acquired by this device.

docsBpi2CmtsCACertEntry.name: docsBpi2CmtsCACertEntry
docsBpi2CmtsCACertEntry.description: A row in the Certificate Authority certificate table.

docsBpi2CmtsCACertSubject.name: docsBpi2CmtsCACertSubject
docsBpi2CmtsCACertSubject.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 9.2.4
docsBpi2CmtsCACertSubject.description: The subject name exactly as it is encoded in the X509 certificate. The organizationName portion of the certificate's subject name must be present. All other fields are optional. Any optional field present must be prepended with CR (carriage return) LF (line feed) ASCII characters. Ordering of fields present must conform to: organizationName CR LF countryName CR LF stateOrProvinceName CR LF localityName CR LF organizationalUnitName CR LF organizationalUnitName=<Manufacturing Location> CR LF commonName

docsBpi2CmtsCACertIssuer.name: docsBpi2CmtsCACertIssuer
docsBpi2CmtsCACertIssuer.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 9.2.4
docsBpi2CmtsCACertIssuer.description: The issuer name exactly as it is encoded in the X509 certificate. The commonName portion of the certificate's issuer name must be present. All other fields are optional. Any optional field present must be prepended with CR (carriage return) LF (line feed) ASCII characters. Ordering of fields present must conform to: commonName CR LF countryName CR LF stateOrProvinceName CR LF localityName CR LF organizationName CR LF organizationalUnitName CR LF organizationalUnitName=<Manufacturing Location>

docsBpi2CmtsCACertSerialNumber.name: docsBpi2CmtsCACertSerialNumber
docsBpi2CmtsCACertSerialNumber.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 9.2.2
docsBpi2CmtsCACertSerialNumber.description: This CA certificate's serial number represented as an octet string.

docsBpi2CmtsCACertTrust.name: docsBpi2CmtsCACertTrust
docsBpi2CmtsCACertTrust.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 9.4.1
docsBpi2CmtsCACertTrust.description: This object controls the trust status of this certificate. Root certificates must be given root trust; manufacturer certificates must not be given root trust. Trust on root certificates must not change. Note: Setting this object need only affect the validity of CM certificates sent in future authorization requests; instantaneous effect need not occur.

docsBpi2CmtsCACertSource.name: docsBpi2CmtsCACertSource
docsBpi2CmtsCACertSource.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 9.4.1
docsBpi2CmtsCACertSource.description: This object indicates how the certificate reached the CMTS. Other means it originated from a source not identified above.

docsBpi2CmtsCACertStatus.name: docsBpi2CmtsCACertStatus
docsBpi2CmtsCACertStatus.description: Standard RowStatus objects except: a) if a row has ever been activated, a set to docsBpi2CmtsCACert need not succeed, b) inactive rows need not be timed out, c) if a row has ever been activated, a destroy setting need not succeed.

docsBpi2CmtsCACert.name: docsBpi2CmtsCACert
docsBpi2CmtsCACert.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 9.2.
docsBpi2CmtsCACert.description: An X509 DER-encoded certificate authority certificate. To help identify certificates, either this object or docsBpi2CmtsCACertThumbprint must be returned by a CMTS for self-signed CA certificates. Note: The NULL string must be returned, on reads, if the entire certificate is not retained in the CMTS.

docsBpi2CmtsCACertThumbprint.name: docsBpi2CmtsCACertThumbprint
docsBpi2CmtsCACertThumbprint.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section 9.4.3
docsBpi2CmtsCACertThumbprint.description: The SHA-1 hash of a CA certificate. To help identify certificates, either this object or docsBpi2CmtsCACert must be returned by a CMTS for self-signed CA certificates. Note: The NULL string must be returned if this object is not supported by the CMTS.

docsBpi2CodeDownloadStatusCode.name: docsBpi2CodeDownloadStatusCode
docsBpi2CodeDownloadStatusCode.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section D.3.3.2 & D.3.5.1.
docsBpi2CodeDownloadStatusCode.description: The value indicates the result of the latest config file CVC verification, SNMP CVC verification, or code file verification.

docsBpi2CodeDownloadStatusString.name: docsBpi2CodeDownloadStatusString
docsBpi2CodeDownloadStatusString.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section TBD (see D.3.7)
docsBpi2CodeDownloadStatusString.description: The value of this object indicates the additional information to the status code. The value will include the error code and error description which will be defined separately.

docsBpi2CodeMfgOrgName.name: docsBpi2CodeMfgOrgName
docsBpi2CodeMfgOrgName.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section D.3.2.2.
docsBpi2CodeMfgOrgName.description: The value of this object is the device manufacturer's organizationName.

docsBpi2CodeMfgCodeAccessStart.name: docsBpi2CodeMfgCodeAccessStart
docsBpi2CodeMfgCodeAccessStart.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section D.3.2.2.
docsBpi2CodeMfgCodeAccessStart.description: The value of this object is the device manufacturer's current codeAccessStart value referenced to Greenwich Mean Time (GMT).

docsBpi2CodeMfgCvcAccessStart.name: docsBpi2CodeMfgCvcAccessStart
docsBpi2CodeMfgCvcAccessStart.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section D.3.2.2.
docsBpi2CodeMfgCvcAccessStart.description: The value of this object is the device manufacturer's current cvcAccessStart value referenced to Greenwich Mean Time (GMT).

docsBpi2CodeCoSignerOrgName.name: docsBpi2CodeCoSignerOrgName
docsBpi2CodeCoSignerOrgName.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section D.3.2.2.
docsBpi2CodeCoSignerOrgName.description: The value of this object is the Co-Signer's organizationName. The value is a zero length string if the co-signer is not specified.

docsBpi2CodeCoSignerCodeAccessStart.name: docsBpi2CodeCoSignerCodeAccessStart
docsBpi2CodeCoSignerCodeAccessStart.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section D.3.2.2.
docsBpi2CodeCoSignerCodeAccessStart.description: The value of this object is the Co-Signer's current codeAccessStart value referenced to Greenwich Mean Time (GMT). If docsBpi2CodeCoSignerOrgName is a zero length string, the value of this object is meaningless.

docsBpi2CodeCoSignerCvcAccessStart.name: docsBpi2CodeCoSignerCvcAccessStart
docsBpi2CodeCoSignerCvcAccessStart.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section D.3.2.2.
docsBpi2CodeCoSignerCvcAccessStart.description: The value of this object is the Co-Signer's current cvcAccessStart value referenced to Greenwich Mean Time (GMT). If docsBpi2CodeCoSignerOrgName is a zero length string, the value of this object is meaningless.

docsBpi2CodeCvcUpdate.name: docsBpi2CodeCvcUpdate
docsBpi2CodeCvcUpdate.reference: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification, Section D.3.3.2.2.
docsBpi2CodeCvcUpdate.description: Setting a CVC to this object triggers the device to verify the CVC and update the cvcAccessStart value. If the device is not enabled to upgrade codefiles, or the CVC verification fails, the CVC will be rejected. Reading this object always returns the null string.

docsBpi2BasicCompliance.name: docsBpi2BasicCompliance
docsBpi2BasicCompliance.description: This is the compliance statement for devices which implement the DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Interface.

docsBpi2CmGroup.name: docsBpi2CmGroup
docsBpi2CmGroup.description: This collection of objects provides CM BPI+ status and control.

docsBpi2CmtsGroup.name: docsBpi2CmtsGroup
docsBpi2CmtsGroup.description: This collection of objects provides CMTS BPI+ status and control.

docsBpi2CodeDownloadGroup.name: docsBpi2CodeDownloadGroup
docsBpi2CodeDownloadGroup.description: This collection of objects provide authenticated software download support.

docsBpi2ObsoleteObjectsGroup.name: docsBpi2ObsoleteObjectsGroup
docsBpi2ObsoleteObjectsGroup.description: This is a collection of obsolete BPI+ objects.
